spriter.name: Scml
spriter.description: Load and playback SCML files from BrashMonkey's Spriter animation toolkit.
spriter.help-url: http://<your website or a manual entry on Scirra.com>

scml-file.name: SCML file
scml-file.desc: The source SCML file for your character

starting-entity.name: starting entity
starting-entity.desc: The character's name within the file

starting-animation.name: starting animation
starting-animation.desc: The animation to play on start

nickname-in-c2.name: nickname in C3
nickname-in-c2.desc: The name displayed within the C3 editor instead of the filename

blend-mode.name: blend mode
blend-mode.desc: The name displayed within the C3 editor instead of the filename

onanimfinished0.description: Triggered when the animation has finished.

animation0.name: Animation
animation0.desc: Enter the name of the animation that has finished.

onanyanimfinished1.description: Triggered when any animation has finished.

comparecurrentkey2.description: Compare the current key frame number.

current_key_frame_is0.name: Current Key Frame is
current_key_frame_is0.desc: Is the current Key Frame <,>,=,etc to the value below

frame1.name: Frame
frame1.desc: The frame number to compare the current key frame to

current_animation_time_is0.name: Current Animation Time is
current_animation_time_is0.desc: Is the current time <,>,=,etc to the value below

time1.name: Time
time1.desc: The time to compare the current key frame to

time_format4.name: Time Format
time_format4.desc: Is the 'Time' value above expressed in milliseconds or as a ratio

compareanimation4.description: Compare the name of the current animation.

comparesecondanimation.description: Compare the name of the second animation.

animation0.name: Animation
animation0.desc: Is this the current second animation.

onurlloaded.description: Triggered after 'Load from Url' when the project has finished loading.

onurlfailed.description: Triggered after 'Load from Url' the project fails to load.

onsoundtriggered7.description: Triggered when a sound should begin playback.

onsoundvolumechangetriggered8.description: Triggered when a sound's volume should change.

onsoundpanningchangetriggered9.description: Triggered when a sound's volume should change.

ismirrored10.description: True when the object is mirrored on the x axis

isflipped11.description: True when the object is mirrored on the y axis

readyforsetup666.description: Triggered when .SCML file has loaded and is ready to be associated with objects.

actionpointexists12.display-text: Action Point {0} exists on current frame
actionpointexists12.description: True when the action point exists on the current frame

outsidepaddedviewport13.description: True when this object's x,y coordinate is outside the padded display box set through Set Automatic Pausing action.

oneventtriggered14.description: Triggered upon Spriter events in animation.

tagactive15.display-text: Tag {0} is active on current frame({1})
tagactive15.description: True when the tag is active

object_name1.name: object name
object_name1.desc: The name of the sprite, bone, sound, etc to check for a tag.  Leave blank for universal tags (the object's name in Spriter, not the name of the C3 object)

compareentity16.description: Compare the name of the current entity.

objectexists17.description: True when the action object exists on the current frame

CompareZElevation.description: Compare the Z elevation to a value.

which.name: Which
which.desc: Compare either the Z elevation (relative to its own layer), or the total Z elevation (taking into account the layer Z elevation)

comparison.name: Comparison
comparison.desc: How to compare the Z elevation

z_elevation.name: Z elevation
z_elevation.desc: The Z elevation to compare to.

associatetypewithname666.description: Associate an object with its Spriter name.

object0.name: Object
object0.desc: Choose the object type you wish to associate.

name1.name: Name
name1.desc: The name Spriter uses for this object.

loadFromURL.description: Load project from a web address or data URI.

url.name: URI
url.desc: Enter the URL on the web, or data URI, of an image to load.

crossOrigin.name: Cross-origin
crossOrigin.desc: The cross-origin (CORS) mode to use for the request.

sconText.name: scon text
sconText.desc: Enter the text of the scon to load (usually retrieved with AJAX.LastData).

setanimation0.display-text: Set animation to {0} and {1} with a {2}ms blend

animation0.name: Animation
animation0.desc: The name of the animation to set.

where_to_start_playing_this_animation6.name: Where to start playing this animation
where_to_start_playing_this_animation6.desc: Play this animation from the beginning? or play from current time or time ratio

blend_duration7.name: Blend Duration
blend_duration7.desc: If a blend option is chosen above, the length of time (in milliseconds) to take to blend to the new animation

setplaybackspeedratio1.description: Set the ratio of playback speed

speed_ratio0.name: Speed Ratio
speed_ratio0.desc: The new ratio of playback speed (1.0 is full speed. 0.5 is half speed, 2.0 is double speed)

setobjectscaleratio2.description: Set the ratio of object scale

scale_ratio0.name: Scale Ratio
scale_ratio0.desc: The new ratio of the object scale (1.0 is full size. 0.5 is half size, 2.0 is double size)

flip_x_axis3.name: Flip X Axis
flip_x_axis3.desc: Flip on the X Axis and display with negative width

flip_y_axis6.name: Flip Y Axis
flip_y_axis6.desc: Flip on the Y Axis and display with negative height

setanimationloop3.description: Set whether or not an animation loops

loop_animation?2.name: Loop animation?
loop_animation?2.desc: Loop animation, or play only once? (overrides animation settings from file)

setanimationtime4.display-text: Set current time in animation to {1} {0}

time_units2.name: time units
time_units2.desc: New position in current animation to be specified in milliseconds, or as a ration of the total length of the animation between 0.0 and 1.0?

new_position3.name: New Position
new_position3.desc: The new position in milliseconds or as a ratio from 0.0 to 1.0

playanimto7.description: Play animation from current time to...

3.desc: What type of value are specifying below to play the animation to

target4.name: Target
target4.desc: The target time to play the current animation to (units specified above)

entity0.name: Entity
entity0.desc: The name of the entity to set.

animation1.name: Animation
animation1.desc: The name of the animation to set. Leave blank to attempt to switch to animation of same name.

removeallcharmaps9.description: Remove all character maps from the character

removeCharMap.description: Remove character map from the character

character_map.name: Character Map
character_map.desc: The character map to remove from this character.

appendcharmap10.description: Append character map to this character

character_map0.name: Character Map
character_map0.desc: The character map to append to this character.

setobjectxflip11.description: Set whether the object is mirrored on the x axis

mirror_x_axis2.name: Mirror X Axis
mirror_x_axis2.desc: Flip on the X Axis and display with negative width

setobjectyflip12.description: Set whether the object is flipped on the y axis

flip_y_axis2.name: Flip Y Axis
flip_y_axis2.desc: Flip on the Y Axis and display with negative width

animation0.name: Animation
animation0.desc: The name of the second animation to set.

setanimblendratio14.description: Set the blend ratio of the current animations

blend_level0.name: Blend level
blend_level0.desc: The new new ratio from 0.0 to 1.0 of the blend between the current and blended animations

stopsecondanim15.description: Stops blending the second(blended) animation, and resumes normal playback of the current animation

setvisible16.description: Choose whether the object is hidden or shown

visibility2.name: Visibility
visibility2.desc: Choose whether the object is hidden or shown

setautomaticpausing17.display-text: Set to {0}. Padding Left:{1} Right:{2} Top:{3} Bottom{4}
setautomaticpausing17.description: Set when to automatically pause an animation for efficiency

automatic_pause_settings3.name: Automatic Pause Settings
automatic_pause_settings3.desc: Set the new automatic pausing settings

items.pause all playback automatically when sc: Pause all playback automatically when scml object position is outside padded display area
items.pause all playback except sound automati: Pause all playback except sound automatically when scml object position is outside padded display area

left_padding4.name: Left Padding
left_padding4.desc: The object must be outside the visible area of the screen plus this padding to automatically pause

right_padding5.name: Right Padding
right_padding5.desc: The object must be outside the visible area of the screen plus this padding to automatically pause

top_padding6.name: Top Padding
top_padding6.desc: The object must be outside the visible area of the screen plus this padding to automatically pause

bottom_padding7.name: Bottom Padding
bottom_padding7.desc: The object must be outside the visible area of the screen plus this padding to automatically pause

setopacity18.description: Set how transparent the object appears.

opacity0.name: Opacity
opacity0.desc: Choose the object opacity, from 0 (transparent) to 100(opaque)

object_name0.name: Object Name
object_name0.desc: The name of the sprite, bone, sound, etc to override animation for (the object's name in Spriter, not the name of the C3 object)

override_component12.name: Override Component
override_component12.desc: The component value you want to override

overrideboneswithik20.display-text: Override bones {0} and {1} with IK to ({2},{3}) with child bone extended by {4}
overrideboneswithik20.description: Use IK to override bones' animation data.

parent_bone_name0.name: Parent Bone Name
parent_bone_name0.desc: The name of the parent bone you want to use IK on

child_bone_name1.name: Child Bone Name
child_bone_name1.desc: The name of the child bone you want to use IK on

target_x2.name: Target X
target_x2.desc: X location you want the IK joint to reach for

target_y3.name: Target Y
target_y3.desc: Y location you want the IK joint to reach for

setc2objecttospriterobject21.list-name: Set C3 Object to Spriter Object
setc2objecttospriterobject21.description: Set C3 Object's angle and/or position to Spriter Object.

c2_object0.name: C3 Object
c2_object0.desc: Choose the C3 Object you want to set to a Spriter Object

set_which_properties4.name: Set which properties
set_which_properties4.desc: The properties you want to set to the Spriter Object

spriter_object5.name: Spriter Object
spriter_object5.desc: The Spriter Object you want to set it to

setignoreglobaltimescale22.description: Set whether or not to ignore the global time scale of the current layout.

ignore_layout_time_scale?2.name: Ignore layout time scale?
ignore_layout_time_scale?2.desc: Set whether or not to ignore the global time scale of the current layout

findspriterobject23.list-name: Find Spriter Object from C3 Object
findspriterobject23.description: Find Spriter Object that corresponds with the C3 Object (retrieve with expression 'foundObject'.

c2_object0.name: C3 Object
c2_object0.desc: Choose the C3 Object you want to find the corresponding Spriter Object of

stopresumesettinglayer24.description: Stop or resume setting layer to allow you to override them

setspritelayers8.name: Set Sprite Layers
setspritelayers8.desc: Choose whether to stop or resume setting layers for individual sprites

stopresumesettingvisibilityforobjects.list-name: Stop/Resume Setting Sprite and Box Visibility
stopresumesettingvisibilityforobjects.description: Stop or resume setting visibility to allow you to override them

setspritevisibility.name: Set Sprite/Box Visibility
setspritevisibility.desc: Choose whether to stop or resume setting visibility for individual sprites

stopresumesettingcollisionsforobjects.list-name: Stop/Resume Setting Sprite and Box Collisions
stopresumesettingcollisionsforobjects.description: Stop or resume setting collisions to allow you to override them

setspritevisibility.name: Set Sprite/Box Collisions
setspritevisibility.desc: Choose whether to stop or resume setting collisions for individual sprites

pinC2ObjectToSpriterObject27.list-name: Pin C3 Object to Spriter Object
pinC2ObjectToSpriterObject27.description: Pin C3 Object's angle and/or position to Spriter Object.

c2_object0.name: C3 Object
c2_object0.desc: Choose the C3 Object you want to pin to a Spriter Object

set_which_properties4.name: Set which properties
set_which_properties4.desc: The properties you want to set to the Spriter Object

spriter_object5.name: Spriter Object
spriter_object5.desc: The Spriter Object you want to pin it to

unpinC2ObjectFromSpriterObject25.list-name: Unpin C3 Object to Spriter Object
unpinC2ObjectFromSpriterObject25.description: Unpin C3 Object's angle and/or position from Spriter Object.

c2_object0.name: C3 Object
c2_object0.desc: Choose the C3 Object you want to unpin a Spriter Object

spriter_object5.name: Spriter Object
spriter_object5.desc: The Spriter Object you want to unpin from. Leave empty string for all objects

unpinAllFromSpriterObject26.description: Unpin all C3 Objects from Spriter Object.

spriter_object5.name: Spriter Object
spriter_object5.desc: The Spriter Object you unpin all objects from. Leave empty string for all objects

z_elevation.name: Z elevation
z_elevation.desc: New Z elevation. The camera starts at Z 100 looking down to Z 0.

time.description: Returns the current time in the animation between 0 and animation length.

key.description: Returns the index of the current keyframe in the animation between 0 and the number of keys.

scaleratio.description: Returns the scale ratio of the object

playto.description: Returns the target time in the animation between 0 and animation length for the current 'Play animation to...' action, or -1 if there is no current 'Play animation to...' action

playtotimeleft.description: Returns the remaining number of milliseconds(at normal playback speed) left to complete the current 'Play animation to...' action

animationname.description: Returns the name of the current animation

entityname.description: Returns the name of the current entity

timeratio.description: Returns the current time as a ratio of the entire animation length between 0.0 and 1.0

pointx.description: returns the current x position of an action point

pointy.description: returns the current y position of an action point

pointangle.description: returns the current angle of an action point

triggeredsound.description: returns the name of the last triggered sound

triggeredsoundtag.description: returns the name of the last triggered sound's tag

soundvolume.description: returns the volume of the sound

soundpanning.description: returns the panning of the sound

blendratio.description: returns the current blend ratio of animations 0(current animation) to 1(next animation)

secondanimationname.description: returns the name of the second(blended) animation

val.description: returns the currentValue of the Spriter variable (variable name, object name) (the object's name in Spriter, not the name of the C3 object)

getopacity.description: Get the object's current opacity, from 0 (transparent) to 100 (opaque).

objectx.description: returns the current x position of an object

objecty.description: returns the current y position of an object

objectangle.description: returns the current angle of an object

animationlength.description: Returns the of the current animation in milliseconds (at normal playback speed)

speedratio.description: Returns the current playback speed ratio (1.0 is full speed. 0.5 is half speed, 2.0 is double speed)

bboxleft.description: Get the left edge of the object's bounding box, in pixels.

bboxright.description: Get the right edge of the object's bounding box, in pixels.

bboxtop.description: Get the top edge of the object's bounding box, in pixels.

bboxbottom.description: Get the bottom edge of the object's bounding box, in pixels.

foundobject.description: returns the name of the last found object (Find Spriter Object action)

ZElevation.description: Get the Z elevation relative to its layer

TotalZElevation.description: Get the total Z elevation taking into account the layer Z elevation
